lines.text: Force of gravity on an object
Force that opposes one object sliding past another

secText:
In-class assessment:
1. [OBJ:qc_37439:Calculate] an equal and opposite force using Newton's third law and weight.
2. [OBJ:qc_37437:Calculate] an object's weight on Earth.
3. [OBJ:qc_37440:Calculate] the normal force acting on an object at rest.
4. [OBJ:qc_37441:Calculate] the tension due to a rope on an object at rest.
5. [OBJ:qc_37442:Calculate] the static friction acting on an object at rest.
6. [OBJ:qc_37443:Calculate] the kinetic friction acting on a moving object.
